documents.t: View an App Demo for Your Website
👇 Click or tap these little triangles to see more updates!

Without purchase__, you can view an App Demo of Your Website using the drag&drop FluxBuilder App Builder for Free 🔻 There are only 5 steps: The [Problem Internal Link] if you get an issue when using. remarque The Test APK (app demo)
documents.s: View an App Demo for Your Website

documents.t: There are 6 steps to build iOS & Android Apps for your Websites using drag&drop FluxBuilder App Builder: Untitled Untitled Untitled Untitled The [Problem Internal Link] if you get an issue when using.

Build your own apps to publish them to Google Play and Apple Store for your business. With a regular license, you can build your app with Android Studio (or any code editor) and Flutter. Please export your configured Design and Features files, copy them to the source code of FluxStore app. Then go to this guide https://support.inspireui.com/, find your app name, select "Getting Started" to follow step by step. With an extended license or [Problem Internal Link] Video guide image

Select Test APK or Test iOS to receive an email with your App Demo: Note: - Please <u>do not test</u> _the App's features_ <u>on the simulator of FluxBuilder</u> because of limitation of Flutter framework. - <u>Non-work features are NORMALLY</u> _because they require additional configuration_ (e.g. Map, Social Login, Push Notifications, Dynamic Link, Realtime chat, etc.). So if they don’t work on your App from Test APK or Test iOS, it is PROPERLY because they need to configure more.
✨Join our group for the latest information & guide. remarque Click the arrow icon to expand and see detail.

Last updated: April 10th, 2023 Medium Blog: https://inspireui.medium.com/984c8490903e (1) FluxGPT 🎉​ FluxBuilder 1.7.0 supports [Problem Internal Link] - a Powerful App with ChatGPT, OpenAI Writing Assistant & Image Generator. You can build your app with your Wordpress website or without website. (2) Fullscreen Tabbar option 🌈​ Ability to hide TabBar when opening the tab, except the default tab. Screenshot (3) Shopping Video Widget ▶️​ Support video list view like Tiktok and Youtube Short with .mp4 file. Load the video list (get from Product) from TabBar. Video image (4) Product Add-Ons ⭐️​ Ability to configure the File Upload feature on a product (especially for drug store/ online medicine store, needs to upload prescription) Screenshot (5) Google Analytics 📈​ This is a great feature to allow user could see their order from the mobile app by using Google Analytics. Measure via Firebase analytics. Screenshot The result on Firebase Analytics dashboard: (6) Midtrans Payment 💰​ Midtrans - Payment Gateway of Indonesia is available on the 3.8.0+ version with the extended license. Ability to manage all payments and send funds (disbursement) easily. Screenshot (7) In-App Purchases💰​ When clicking Buy Now button in Product Detail screen, if the product price is the same with In-App Purchase products on AppStore, it will pay via In-App Purchases. Available on iOS, WooCommerce, and extended license. Video image (8) Stripe payment on Shopify 💳​ Shopify app has the flexible checkout with Card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay by Stripe. This feature is available for extended license. Compatible with https://pub.dev/packages/pay Video image 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]​ Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.7.0 Download FluxBuilder https://github.com/inspireui/fluxbuilder/releases 🌈Premium one month​ One month [Problem Internal Link] is available. Helps to build your app without coding. Screenshot :: Improvements​ Biometrics A convenient method for authorizing access to your app by: Face ID, Touch ID⭐️ in cases: Login Checkout Using Wallet No need to remember the account username and password. Screenshot ChatGPT Smart Chat supports ChatGPT - A powerful AI Writing Assistant on App. Available for the extended license Screenshot Query Radius FluxStore Listing and FluxStore Multi Vendors apps show Query Radius in Google Maps feature. Expand information on Product Detail Ability to show or hide expanded product information and description. Guest Checkout Allow customers to checkout without logging in on Shopify app.
FluxBuilder 1.7.0 supports [Problem Internal Link] - a Powerful App with ChatGPT, OpenAI Writing Assistant & Image Generator. You can build your app with your Wordpress website or without website.
Ability to hide TabBar when opening the tab, except the default tab. Screenshot
Support video list view like Tiktok and Youtube Short with .mp4 file. Load the video list (get from Product) from TabBar. Video image
Ability to configure the File Upload feature on a product (especially for drug store/ online medicine store, needs to upload prescription) Screenshot
This is a great feature to allow user could see their order from the mobile app by using Google Analytics. Measure via Firebase analytics. Screenshot The result on Firebase Analytics dashboard:
Midtrans - Payment Gateway of Indonesia is available on the 3.8.0+ version with the extended license. Ability to manage all payments and send funds (disbursement) easily. Screenshot

When clicking Buy Now button in Product Detail screen, if the product price is the same with In-App Purchase products on AppStore, it will pay via In-App Purchases. Available on iOS, WooCommerce, and extended license. Video image
Shopify app has the flexible checkout with Card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay by Stripe. This feature is available for extended license. Compatible with https://pub.dev/packages/pay Video image

Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.7.0 Download FluxBuilder https://github.com/inspireui/fluxbuilder/releases
One month [Problem Internal Link] is available. Helps to build your app without coding. Screenshot

Biometrics A convenient method for authorizing access to your app by: Face ID, Touch ID⭐️ in cases: Login Checkout Using Wallet No need to remember the account username and password. Screenshot ChatGPT Smart Chat supports ChatGPT - A powerful AI Writing Assistant on App. Available for the extended license Screenshot Query Radius FluxStore Listing and FluxStore Multi Vendors apps show Query Radius in Google Maps feature. Expand information on Product Detail Ability to show or hide expanded product information and description. Guest Checkout Allow customers to checkout without logging in on Shopify app.

Last updated: Jan 10th, 2023 (1) Search bar 🔎​ Easy to search any features. (2) Google Map Styles 🗾​ Ability to customize the style of Google Map to be different between Dark and White modes. 250+ advanced customizations, elegant Cloud-based maps styling. Save development time and resources. Screenshot Configure on FluxBuilder: Some elegant Google Map Styles: (3) Rating Color 🎨​ Quickly configure Color for Rating. (4) Phone Number Config ☎️​ On the Checkout screen, this feature helps to validate the phone number entered using Google's libphonenumber. Screenshot (5) Native Multiple Stripe Methods 🏦​ Support native Multiple Payment Methods IDs for the Native Stripe. Available for Extended license of FluxStore apps. Screenshot (6) Easy Paypal: Native Checkout 💳​ Checkout via native UI of PayPal SDK Available for Extended license of FluxStore apps. Video image Screenshot (7) Chat with Customers🎨​ You (owner/vendor) easy to chat with your customers via Realtime Chat on FluxBuilder. Available for macOS and Extended license of FluxStore apps. 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]​ Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.6.1 Download FluxBuilder https://github.com/inspireui/fluxbuilder/releases 🌈Premium one month​ One month [Problem Internal Link] is available. Helps to build your app without coding. Screenshot :: Improvements​ History In 1.6.0 and previous, History will can load only Design/UI of your app. From 1.6.1 and later, it can load both Design and Features. Easily for you to design. Save Save button (recommended) will store all changes to cloud. Open your app on other laptops or FluxBuilder Web, you can see all the changes. Apply button will apply your change only (on your local). Need to click Apply to apply your change, then Save. Excluded Payment Method IDs Some users want to hide some unnecessary payment methods (show webview) on the app through FluxBuilder, without changing the source code. Product Variant Layout On the simulator, select a variant product, you will see the right banner as below: Enable Smart COD Help vendor/shopper to set a fee for Charge On Delivery: Default Sort By and Order Ability to set the default value for Sort By and Order items, on: Home > Products Horizontal Product Cart Customize: Custom Reset Password URL Ability to edit the Reset Password URL on FluxBuilder:

Ability to customize the style of Google Map to be different between Dark and White modes. 250+ advanced customizations, elegant Cloud-based maps styling. Save development time and resources. Screenshot Configure on FluxBuilder: Some elegant Google Map Styles:
On the Checkout screen, this feature helps to validate the phone number entered using Google's libphonenumber. Screenshot
Support native Multiple Payment Methods IDs for the Native Stripe. Available for Extended license of FluxStore apps. Screenshot
Checkout via native UI of PayPal SDK Available for Extended license of FluxStore apps. Video image Screenshot
You (owner/vendor) easy to chat with your customers via Realtime Chat on FluxBuilder. Available for macOS and Extended license of FluxStore apps.

One month [Problem Internal Link] is available. Helps to build your app without coding. Screenshot

History In 1.6.0 and previous, History will can load only Design/UI of your app. From 1.6.1 and later, it can load both Design and Features. Easily for you to design. Save Save button (recommended) will store all changes to cloud. Open your app on other laptops or FluxBuilder Web, you can see all the changes. Apply button will apply your change only (on your local). Need to click Apply to apply your change, then Save. Excluded Payment Method IDs Some users want to hide some unnecessary payment methods (show webview) on the app through FluxBuilder, without changing the source code. Product Variant Layout On the simulator, select a variant product, you will see the right banner as below: Enable Smart COD Help vendor/shopper to set a fee for Charge On Delivery: Default Sort By and Order Ability to set the default value for Sort By and Order items, on: Home > Products Horizontal Product Cart Customize: Custom Reset Password URL Ability to edit the Reset Password URL on FluxBuilder:

Last updated: Nov 04th, 2022 ✨View this FluxBuilder Blog for more detail. (1) Quick Improve TikTok 🎨​ • Improve loading time for TikTok layout • Please select TikTok Videos widget, change Username, input a Video ID and Update to active TikTok again: (2) One Month Support plan 🎨​ After the free-support 6 months, if you need to extend your Technical Support period or change Domain, use the SUPPORT plan. (3) Compatible with New Stuff 🎨​ Compatible with macOS Ventura 🎉 Compatible with the latest FluxStore v3.3. (4) New AppBar template 🎨​ A new template supports 2-row appbar. (5) New Shoes UI template ⚡️​ Available for Extended license and [Problem Internal Link]. (6) TabMenu & Scrollable 🚀​ Add new 2 UI complex layout types: TabMenu & Scrollable. Use the Dynamic screens as the sub pages. The Vertical layout is not used for these new UIs. Video image (7) MultiLevel Category layout 🧩​ Category layouts has a new MultiLevel - useful to configure level of Categories. Large number of Categories: useful for more than 100 Categories data. Screenshot (8) Vertical Product List ♻️​ New UI for Vertical Product List on Home page: Column With Filter. Screenshot (9) Phone Number Config ☎️​ On the Checkout screen, this feature helps to validate the phone number entered using Google's libphonenumber. Simpler and cheaper than sending OTP to verify phone number. Features Check validation of Phone Number. Ability to customize Default Country. Use for either normal or international phone numbers. Support customizing the Country List. Show or hide Flag Image. Support RTL language. Have 3 Selector Types for choosing country list. Screenshot (10) Hide/show Tabs ⭐️​ Easily show or hide Tabs from the bottom tab menu options. Also can set the Default tab/screen. Video image 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]​ Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.6.0 Download FluxBuilder https://github.com/inspireui/fluxbuilder/releases 🌈Premium one month​ One month [Problem Internal Link] is available. Helps to build your app without coding. Screenshot :: Improvements​ Scroll Tabs list to the bottom when Add new screen Auto-build iOS and Android: Support keep building when navigator to another side bar
• Improve loading time for TikTok layout • Please select TikTok Videos widget, change Username, input a Video ID and Update to active TikTok again:
After the free-support 6 months, if you need to extend your Technical Support period or change Domain, use the SUPPORT plan.
Compatible with macOS Ventura 🎉 Compatible with the latest FluxStore v3.3.
Available for Extended license and [Problem Internal Link].
Add new 2 UI complex layout types: TabMenu & Scrollable. Use the Dynamic screens as the sub pages. The Vertical layout is not used for these new UIs. Video image
Category layouts has a new MultiLevel - useful to configure level of Categories. Large number of Categories: useful for more than 100 Categories data. Screenshot
New UI for Vertical Product List on Home page: Column With Filter. Screenshot

On the Checkout screen, this feature helps to validate the phone number entered using Google's libphonenumber. Simpler and cheaper than sending OTP to verify phone number. Features Check validation of Phone Number. Ability to customize Default Country. Use for either normal or international phone numbers. Support customizing the Country List. Show or hide Flag Image. Support RTL language. Have 3 Selector Types for choosing country list. Screenshot
Easily show or hide Tabs from the bottom tab menu options. Also can set the Default tab/screen. Video image

Last updated: Sep 16th, 2022 (1) Smooth on Windows ⚡️​ This version fixed on hang/crash issue on Windows. Let's enjoy 🥂 (2) Lifetime to Use ⏰​ Regular license users can use FluxBuilder lifetime to: Edit App Design Export Upgrade App Design without re-publishing it to App Stores. (3) Smart Banner ⭐️​ Your App can now display Smart Engagement Banner on Home Screen. Show at the top of the screen. Help your customers easily view an event, sale, or an important announce. image (4) Payment Images 💰​ Ability to update Images for your Payments. (5) Checkout Screen Update 🎉​ Support to customize Checkout page, remove many fields (shipping, city, zip code, street ...etc) 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]​ Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.5.2 Download FluxBuilder https://github.com/inspireui/fluxbuilder/releases 🌈Premium one month​ One month [Problem Internal Link] for trial is available. Screenshot
This version fixed on hang/crash issue on Windows. Let's enjoy 🥂
Regular license users can use FluxBuilder lifetime to: Edit App Design Export Upgrade App Design without re-publishing it to App Stores.
Your App can now display Smart Engagement Banner on Home Screen. Show at the top of the screen. Help your customers easily view an event, sale, or an important announce. image
Ability to update Images for your Payments.
Support to customize Checkout page, remove many fields (shipping, city, zip code, street ...etc)

Last updated: Aug 26th, 2022 (1) Release Web version 🌿​ Web version 1.5.2 of drag&drop FluxBuilder tool is available with Full Features. All operating systems Are able to customize FluxStore Apps on Windows, Mac, Linux, etc. Lifetime Regular license users can use FluxBuilder lifetime to: Edit App Design Export Upgrade App Designs without re-publishing it to App Stores. 💥 We are working hard to release Desktop version 1.5.2 and will notify soon. (2) Sharable Product🥂​ Allow users to generate the Sharable link. Show the Preview mobile and switch Layouts. Screenshot (3) Manager & Delivery Boy 🚚​ Ability to edit Features of 2 apps: FluxStore Manager This app creates Vendor apps for your WooCommerce website (single vendor, WCFM, or Dokan). Besides getting the full source code and edit this app on any code editors. FluxBuilder also helps to edit it features. FluxStore Delivery Boy This app creates apps for your WooCommerce website (single vendor, WCFM, or Dokan). Ability to edit features of this app on FluxBuilder 1.5.2 (as well as edit it all on any code editors). (4) Premium one month 💥​ One month [Problem Internal Link] for trial is available. Screenshot (5) Support App Features ⚡️​ Support nearly All available Features and Design of Apps: Paystack payment Flutterwave payment Age Restrictions Blog Integration etc. Screenshot 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]🌈​ Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.5.2

Web version 1.5.2 of drag&drop FluxBuilder tool is available with Full Features. All operating systems Are able to customize FluxStore Apps on Windows, Mac, Linux, etc. Lifetime Regular license users can use FluxBuilder lifetime to: Edit App Design Export Upgrade App Designs without re-publishing it to App Stores. 💥 We are working hard to release Desktop version 1.5.2 and will notify soon.
Allow users to generate the Sharable link. Show the Preview mobile and switch Layouts. Screenshot

Ability to edit Features of 2 apps: FluxStore Manager This app creates Vendor apps for your WooCommerce website (single vendor, WCFM, or Dokan). Besides getting the full source code and edit this app on any code editors. FluxBuilder also helps to edit it features. FluxStore Delivery Boy This app creates apps for your WooCommerce website (single vendor, WCFM, or Dokan). Ability to edit features of this app on FluxBuilder 1.5.2 (as well as edit it all on any code editors).
One month [Problem Internal Link] for trial is available. Screenshot
Support nearly All available Features and Design of Apps: Paystack payment Flutterwave payment Age Restrictions Blog Integration etc. Screenshot

Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.5.2

Version 1.5.1 – June 16th, 2022 Version 1.5.1 – Download Last updated: June 16th, 2022 ✈️ Follow our Medium Blog for more detail about new features https://medium.com/inspireui/announcing-fluxbuilder-1-5-x-b2deced12a89 (1) GDPR & Account Deletion ✅​ Apple's new policy https://developer.apple.com/news/?id=12m75xbj (2) App Performance ⭐️​ You are able to enable the HTTP Cache to save the performance and the repeat network request that will help the app load faster Image Optimization helps to improve performance by enabling the loading of compressed thumbnails instead of original images. (3) Cloud Config 🌨​ Support to configure the updating the app Design without re-publishing to Apple Store and Google Play. Remember to turn off the MStore-API Caching on App Performance. (4) Search Product 🔎​ Ability to enable or disable: the SKU search or the ultimate WordPress search engine Ajax Search Pro, which is available for WooCommerce. (5) Many new Features 🏆​ There are many new items are added to Features tab, such as: Tera Wallet 🧧 Woocommerce Appointment 📆 MyFatoorah Payment 💰 PayTM Payment 💰 Tap Payment 💵 Google Map: help users to set Google API Key for Android, iOS, Web. (6) Upgrade Build On Cloud 🚀​ Integration Configs: let users know which configuration they have done or not. Copy Log button: help users to copy and send to our technical team to more easily investigate the issue you encountered. (7) Others 🍀​ Home tab: some upgrade items: Category tab: ability to disable or enable the Empty Categories 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]🌈​ Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.5.1 Version 1.5.0 – May 15, 2022 Version 1.5.0 – Download Last updated: May 15th, 2022 (1) Support BigCommerce 🅱️​ FluxStore BigCommerce app helps to build apps for your BigCommerce website. FluxBuilder supports to customize app's Design and Features by drag&drop. (2) New TikTok videos widget 🎸​ Show the Video Demo image (3) Remap Categories 🗺​ Many users like to Allows user to control the Position, Order, and Level of Category manually. Available on Side menu (Category part) and Category screen Video image (4) Product List 💦​ Configure the UI of Product List screen. Flexible options to show menu with title or image, to show the Cart icon on the bottom right corner. Video image (5) Webview+Token Feature 🌈​ After logging into the App, the user can access the Webview Page without re-login. Supports on screens: Settings, Side menu, TabBar You also can use Javascript to hide some webview UI on the app. Video image (6) New Parallax Effect 🌠​ Parallax Scrolling Effect Both the foreground and background are moving, but the background typically moves much more slowly, giving the illusion of depth. Parallax Effect is available on below screens: Category Screen Home screen: Banner Image (Static), Products Horizontal Screenshot (7) Always Show AppBar ☀️​ Users can always show AppBar on all screens (including the Detail screen). And more flexible configuration: Elevation, Pinned, Floating, Snap. (8) TabBar on Top 🌇​ Users can show TabBar on top of the screen. And ability to configure always show TabBar on all screens (including the Detail screen). Screenshot Demo (9) [Problem Internal Link] Plans 💥​ Ability to extend the Technical support time by You also can use more extended features of FluxBuilder. Screenshot Demo (10) Upgrade Build On Cloud 🚀​ Ability to download the Keystore, Certificate, Provisioning files automatically from the drag&drop FluxBuilder. Users also can upload the Features env.dart and the Design config JSON files. Or the FluxBuilder will export them automatically. Screenshot This feature available for Extended license or Premium subscription. (11) Test APK ⚡️​ Because of framework limitation, don’t test on the simulator of FluxBuilder. We provide the Test APK feature to help you test your app on Android phone. Test APK only apply the default features of FluxStore app. Some features require additional configuration. So if they don’t work, it is properly: Map: need to configure Google API Key Social Login, Push Notifications, Dynamic Link, Realtime chat: need to configure Firebase as our guide, etc. Need to install our free API. Screenshot (12) Publish 🖌​ A visual Publish button helps users update the Design and Features of app without re-publishing to App Stores. 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]🌈​ Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.5.0 Version 1.4.1 – Feb 02, 2022 Version 1.4.1 – 02 Feb 2022 - Download​ Last updated: Feb 02, 2022 (1) Story Widget 🌈​ Show the Story widget on the Homepage. image (2) Instagram Story widget ☀️​ Show the Instagram widget on the Homepage of FluxStore apps: Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.4.1 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]🌈​

We provide the Test APK feature to help you test your app on Android phone. Test APK only apply the default features of FluxStore app. Some features require additional configuration. So if they don’t work, it is properly: Map: need to configure Google API Key Social Login, Push Notifications, Dynamic Link, Realtime chat: need to configure Firebase as our guide, etc. Need to install our free API. Screenshot (12) Publish 🖌​ A visual Publish button helps users update the Design and Features of app without re-publishing to App Stores. 🌈Check out [Problem Internal Link]🌈​ Upgrade latest FluxBuilder If you are using the old version, follow steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features (env.dart and config json file) Delete the current FluxBuilder on your pc/laptop Install the latest FluxBuilder 1.5.0
FluxStore BigCommerce app helps to build apps for your BigCommerce website. FluxBuilder supports to customize app's Design and Features by drag&drop.
Many users like to Allows user to control the Position, Order, and Level of Category manually. Available on Side menu (Category part) and Category screen Video image
Configure the UI of Product List screen. Flexible options to show menu with title or image, to show the Cart icon on the bottom right corner. Video image

After logging into the App, the user can access the Webview Page without re-login. Supports on screens: Settings, Side menu, TabBar You also can use Javascript to hide some webview UI on the app. Video image

Parallax Scrolling Effect Both the foreground and background are moving, but the background typically moves much more slowly, giving the illusion of depth. Parallax Effect is available on below screens: Category Screen Home screen: Banner Image (Static), Products Horizontal Screenshot
Users can always show AppBar on all screens (including the Detail screen). And more flexible configuration: Elevation, Pinned, Floating, Snap.
Users can show TabBar on top of the screen. And ability to configure always show TabBar on all screens (including the Detail screen). Screenshot Demo
Ability to extend the Technical support time by You also can use more extended features of FluxBuilder. Screenshot Demo

Ability to download the Keystore, Certificate, Provisioning files automatically from the drag&drop FluxBuilder. Users also can upload the Features env.dart and the Design config JSON files. Or the FluxBuilder will export them automatically. Screenshot This feature available for Extended license or Premium subscription.

Because of framework limitation, don’t test on the simulator of FluxBuilder. We provide the Test APK feature to help you test your app on Android phone. Test APK only apply the default features of FluxStore app. Some features require additional configuration. So if they don’t work, it is properly: Map: need to configure Google API Key Social Login, Push Notifications, Dynamic Link, Realtime chat: need to configure Firebase as our guide, etc. Need to install our free API. Select Input your Website URL, select your website Framework, input API Keys/Access Token (if any), then click Make sure you input https instead of http Make sure you do not input sub-folder domain like this https://yaari.store/pk-en because it causes Rest API issue. Please change to subdomain or main domain. Guides to get the Magento’s access token, Shopify’s access token, PrestaShop’s API Key. Select a template. Click (you can skip this step) Enter Click

If you get Run Troubleshoot Cannot see To make the app load faster or to fix missing Product Images, you would resize images, optimize the network request for Images. For Wordpress Please setup the Regenerate Image plugin, then be sure your site plugin has regenerated thumbnail like this https://tppr.me/ckgYZ Firstly, go to Setting/ Media Settings, and set up the image sizes for the Product Image. This is our recommended settings - https://tppr.me/IbRvL Secondly, go to Tools/Regenerate Thumbnails and click the blue button Regenerate Thumbnails For All xx Attachements, then wait for the process to complete https://tppr.me/1fKLE To check if the image is generated correctly, go to Media and click to view any image files, select Regenerate and you can check the list of new images generated with xxx-smal or xxx-medium or xxx-large format https://tppr.me/1UpJj After running the Regenerate successfully, open lib/env.dart and update this value "kIsResizeImage": true, , or if you are using FluxBuilder, enable Image Optimization as https://tppr.me/PaFLh There is a good solution to optimize more image loading by converting the Image to Webp image type by using WebP Express plugin. This is also a good tool which is our recommendation to compress the images in order to optimize the image loading. For Shopify You can modify the width and height of images for high resolution. For example, set _imageWidth to 700 and _imageHeight is 1000 https://tppr.me/u24mx For Prestashop Go to Design > Image Settings, add list requirement images if it does not exist: small_default, medium_default, large_default. Then, tap the Regenerate thumbnails button: https://tppr.me/NO9VG 💠 If you see images have non-good resolution on FluxBuilder, don't worry, we downgrade the resolution of images to improve the speed of FluxBuilder. After building, the app loads images with high resolution smoothly on the real device.

image Install required plugins/API To display full products/images of your website on FluxBuilder, you need to install some plugins/API below to sync with your data/website. Plugins are available after purchasing the FluxStore apps - You can see how your app looks like before purchasing, just ignore some non-synced products/images. Use This guide after purchase. PrestaShop API :::note Click the arrow icon to expand and see detail. ::: If you get ‘failed’ result when Running TroubleShoot on FluxBuilder with your PrestaShop website, follow the solution below: 1. Install Prestashop Custom API Go to Dashboard > Modules > Module Manager > Upload a module. Select the module ‘[PrestashopAPI.zip](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1W4yOd6A-qZSq-LzexoMPRT6QrAEVGVgL/view?usp=sharing)’. 2. Create a new webservice keyGo to Dashboard > Advanced > Webservice > Add a new webservice key. Generate your key and select permissions. Click the Save button after finishing the settingsThere is a list of required permissions with the method GET: `categories, products, product, product_options, product_option_values, languages, attribute, countries, shipping, payment, order_states, addresses, orders, register, signin, countries, states, order_histories, address, cart_rules` ![](/notion_imgs/207946593.png) 3. Enable WebserviceBy default, the webservice feature is disabled on PrestaShop and needs to be switched on before the first use. Go to Dashboard > Advanced > Webservice. Choose “Yes” for the “Enable PrestaShop Webservice” option and click the Save button ![](/notion_imgs/524703473.png) That’s all 🙂 Opencart API If you get ‘failed’ result when Running TroubleShoot on FluxBuilder with your Opencart website, follow the solution below: **Open the admin panel, then click** **`Extensions->Installer`** **and upload this** [**Opencart Extension file**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/14_5NmGHI0yLNhtFX-A8i1zIkxfAQeSK2)**.** Setup Rest API If you get ‘failed’ result when Running TroubleShoot on FluxBuilder with your Listeo, MyListing, or ListingPro website, follow the solution below: The default Woocommerce supports the Rest API, but we need to follow this step to enable the API. This guide is based on the fresh WordPress installing from [http://demo.mstore.io](http://demo.mstore.io/) ### Requirements WordPress permalinks must be enabled at **Settings > Permalinks**. ![](/notion_imgs/1310104813.png) ### **Membership registration**: Enable the option **Anyone** can register. ![](/notion_imgs/69523063.png) Magento API If you get ‘failed’ result when Running TroubleShoot on FluxBuilder with your Magento website, follow the solution below: - Copy [Magento Extension](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OInenrsptbMk2nLzF1_oTf2qOYD6W6Cd/view?usp=sharing) plugin folder to `app/code` folder on your Magento server. - Run this command in the website directory: `php bin/magento setup:upgrade` - Clear the cache on Magento after upgrade: `php bin/magento cache:flush` - Change the Store View code: In Admin Site, Move to Stores -> All Stores and click Store View to change the store code. The store code must be language code like: en, ar... ![](/notion_imgs/1994226697.png)

remarque Click the arrow icon to expand and see detail. Customize the Design of your App easily and flexibly by drag&drop: If you can not drag&drop the elements, press & hold in 3-4 seconds then drag & drop. The simulator on FluxBuilder just shows the app Design, not the features. So please do not click to test features on the simulator. To test the features, please try the app demo Issues and Solutions If there is an issue when customize the Design or Features, please clear Cache by selecting Delete All in https://tppr.me/qU6l3 If the SAVE or UPDATE button does not appear, please make sure you have inputted the purchase code of FluxStore or FluxNews app. Video guide: Edit the image Edit the Logo on Login screen: go to Features, select Theme Config, change the Theme Logo on the right panel as Edit the image Edit the image Enable Cart Quantity on image Edit the image New image Edit the image Edit image Configure the New New For the regular license: More templates for the extended license: image Testimonial image Layout UI Kits & Capture image Override Color Set the color for the Product Filter screen image The Task List Easily manage your steps to use FluxBuilder image Instagram image Tiktok image Story image Webview Page image
FluxBuilder is offered in both desktop and web versions, giving you flexibility in how you choose to use it.

Link to download: https://github.com/inspireui/fluxbuilder/releases To use FluxBuilder from InspireUI, ensure that your system is macOS (64-bit), Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit), or x86-64 based. The simulator on FluxBuilder only displays the app design, not its features. Therefore, please refrain from clicking to test features on the simulator. Instead, to test the features, please try the app demo.

Your system is macOS (64-bit). To install FluxBuilder, please follow these steps: Double-click on FluxBuilder_macOS.zip to unzip its contents. Right-click on FluxBuilder.pkg and select "Open" and then "Open" again. Click "Continue" until the "The installation was successful" message displays. Select Close and Move to Trash (or Keep) to delete (or keep) the FluxBuilder.pkg Press the Command and Space keys simultaneously to open Spotlight Search, then type "FluxBuilder" to run the FluxBuilder tool. Alternatively, you can find it in the Applications folder.

If your system is Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit), x86-64 based, follow these steps: Unzip the Fluxbuilder_windows.xxx file. Open the Release folder, double-click the Fluxbuilder_Setup file, and then select More Info. Click Run anyway and then click Next until FluxBuilder has been successfully installed.

Failed to install on Mac: Right-click on FluxBuilder.pkg > select Open > Open again. It will work. FluxBuilder may start and then immediately close on Windows. To resolve this issue, ensure that your system is running Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit) on an x86-64 based processor. Then, try one of the following solutions: Solution 1 Open Run (by pressing Window + R) Enter this: %appdata% Delete the folder com.inspireui.fluxbuilder inside there to clear FluxBuilder settings. Solution 2 Please install the Webview library shown in this image. If you are still unable to open FluxBuilder, please follow these steps: Open Windows Update Settings > Click on the left menu. Tap to Additional Troubleshooters > Tap to Program Compatibility Troubleshooter > Click Run the troubleshooter. In new window, choose FluxBuilder > Next > Try recommended settings > Check and test program > Next > Yes > Close. Now you have resolved conflicts between FluxBuilder and other applications on your Windows. FluxBuilder shows error about VCRUNTIME140_1.dll file, check below solution: Go to www.google.com, search VCRUNTIME140_1.dll file, download that dll file and copy to C:\Window\system32, Restart Windows PC. FluxBuilder shows error about MSVCP140.dll, check below solution: To add the necessary file, download it from https://www.dll-files.com/msvcp140.dll.html. Once downloaded, add it to the FluxBuilder application folder (usually located in Program Files (x86)/InspireUI/FluxBuilder/fluxbuilder).

If you are using an older version, follow the steps below to upgrade: Export your customized design and features by saving the env.dart and config JSON file. Delete the current FluxBuilder application from your PC or laptop. Install the latest version of FluxBuilder.
image FluxBuilder Web version: https://web.fluxbuilder.com You can use the web version of FluxBuilder on any operating system, including Windows, Mac, and Linux, to customize your apps. Video guide

remarque Click the arrow icon to expand and see detail. You can import or export the Design and Features files: Import In case you already had your own .json or env.dart file (of FluxStore apps). And now you would like to change the app Design or Features. Just import it into the FluxBuilder tool to continue customization. Video image Select Features > Import Data > Open JSON Design File > select your old config .json file (it usually is the lib/config/config_en.json file in your FluxStore source code) > UPDATE. Export Precondition: Activate with your purchase code of FluxStore or FluxNews apps (regular or extended licenses). After designing your app via the FluxBuilder tool, you will export the customized design and feature files and save them to your FluxStore/FluxNews source code. The detailed guide. Video image Update Design without re-publishing to AppStore/Google Play Follow this guide after purchase. Dark & Light image Dark theme of App: Dark theme of FluxBuilder: Discover our FluxStore / FluxNews apps

After launching FluxBuilder, sign up for a new account and login: Select Login as the image below. Then choose Sign Up. - Input your name, email, and new password, then select **Sign Up**. - Check your **mailbox/spam/ads** for the activation email, activate it. _If you_ <u>_do not receive any email_</u>_, on FluxBuilder please select_ <u>_Forgot Password_</u>_, you will receive an email to reset it._ - Then **Login** to FluxBuilder. ![](/notion_imgs/1391096830.png) Issues and Solutions:
